Package de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.random

Class ApacheCommonsRandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.random.ApacheCommonsRandom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRandom
    public class ApacheCommonsRandom
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRandom
    Apache Commons RNG implementation NOTE: Implementation is NOT thread-safe.
    Author:
    Achim Zielesny

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ApacheCommonsRandom​(org.apache.commons.rng.simple.RandomSource aRandomSource, int aSeed, int aNumberOfWarmUpSteps)
      Constructor NOTE: Implementation is NOT thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ApacheCommonsRandom getJumpedRng()
      Returns jumped RNG
      boolean isJumpable()
      Returns if RNG is jumpable
      double nextDouble()
      Returns the next pseudorandom, uniformly distributed double value between 0.0 and 1.0 from this random number generator's sequence.
      double nextGaussian()
      Returns the next pseudorandom, Gaussian ("normally") distributed double value with mean 0.0 and standard deviation 1.0 from this random number generator's sequence.
      double nextZeroMeanUnitVarianceDouble()
      Uniform continuous pseudorandom with zero mean and unit variance

        public ApacheCommonsRandom​(org.apache.commons.rng.simple.RandomSource aRandomSource,
                           int aSeed,
                           int aNumberOfWarmUpSteps)
        Constructor NOTE: Implementation is NOT thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        aRandomSource - Random source
        aSeed - Seed value (greater/equal 0)
        aNumberOfWarmUpSteps - Number of warm-up steps (greater/equal 0)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an argument is illegal
